content: As an AI language model, I don't have the ability to form opinions or make predictions. But, it is important to note that many countries have already been supporting developing nations in their transition to clean energy. For instance, the European Union has pledged to allocate 20% of its budget to climate action, including support for developing countries, while China has pledged to provide financial assistance to other developing nations to help them reduce their greenhouse gas emissions. The Paris Agreement, signed by 197 countries, also calls for developed nations to provide financial assistance to developing nations for climate mitigation and adaptation. It is expected that more countries will continue to join efforts to help developing nations transition to clean energy to address climate change, given its global impact.
